item.title: Logistic map code
item.description: I use the logistic map with various r values to show different dynamics. Note that in this example I set r = 3.95. For those who want to check my work (or experiment themselves), the data in the following figure was generated with this code, and I used matplotlib.pyplot.scatter to generate the figure. If you do change the r value, I suggest also playing with the t value, to see the system evolve over time.
